definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding

sentences.english: Chinese tour operators are notorious for bargaining down travel and hotel costs.
sentences.chinese: 中国旅行团因为在旅行和宾馆花费上砍价而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: He has been consorting with known criminals.
sentences.chinese: 他一直与那些臭名昭著的罪犯有交往。

sentences.english: One day an  infamous young warrior arrived at the village.
sentences.chinese: 一天一个臭名昭著的年轻武士来到了这个村庄。

sentences.english: Discussed will be some infamous cannibals of history.
sentences.chinese: 我们以后还会讨论关于一些臭名昭著的食人的历史。

sentences.english: Being the world's largest retailer and a notorious discounter.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大的零售商和一个臭名昭著的折扣者。

sentences.english: New Orleans hosts the United States' most notorious Mardi Gras festivities.
sentences.chinese: 新奥尔良主办美国最臭名昭著的四旬斋前狂欢节。

sentences.english: The notorious cheapskate finally decided to have a party.
sentences.chinese: 一个臭名昭著的小气鬼决定举办一个聚会。

sentences.english: Once upon a time, there lived a despicable king who was known for his despotism.
sentences.chinese: 从前，有一个卑鄙的国王，以其暴政二臭名昭著。

sentences.english: He'd been consorting with known criminals.
sentences.chinese: 他一直与那些臭名昭著的罪犯有交往。

sentences.english: He became well known for pandering to any man who needed a woman.
sentences.chinese: 他以给人拉皮条而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: The notorious drug - pusher has been contriving an escape from the prison.
sentences.chinese: 臭名昭著的大毒枭一直都在图谋越狱。

sentences.english: The lawyer has defended some of the most notorious criminals.
sentences.chinese: 这名法官已为一些最臭名昭著的罪犯当过辩护律师。

sentences.english: L'Ollonais was particularly notorious for the manner in which he treated his prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 洛约纳尤以他处置他的囚犯的方式而臭名昭著。

sentences.english: So you don't deny going to Las Vegas to meet with a reputed mobster.
sentences.chinese: 那你不否认去了拉斯维加斯见这个臭名昭著的匪徒？

sentences.english: Because of one minor offence he was branded as a common criminal.
sentences.chinese: 由于一个轻罪，他被加上臭名昭著的罪犯的污名。

sentences.english: The figure I saw was the deathly figure of the infamous Jack the Ripper.
sentences.chinese: 这不就是那个臭名昭著的凶手杰克死时的样子吗？

definition: not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
debts of blood crying out for retribution
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
